attributes.action: Make it illegal to have a web site without having a contact number to talk to a human being
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have you been on a web site and not been able to talk to a human to discuss your problems or in extreme cases complain about the service? All web sites should be required by law to have a contact number on the home page to allow users the option of communicating with a human and not the usual computer messages.
